We_are_pleased_to_announce_the_launch: We are pleased to announce the launch of Souq Albaladi Online Hypermarket, your number one source for all food and household goods. Our goal is to deliver to your door the freshest food and groceries possible, with a focus on fresh and clean food, quick delivery, and the availability of everything in stock. Furthermore, we assure you that all of our products are always available at the best prices in Qatar.
Low_prices_and_so: Low prices and so much more
fresh_food_products_and_groceries_Online: Souq Albaladi, founded in 1991, had grown considerably since it first opened in Doha. Our passion for fresh and diverse products worldwide drove us to launch the business in order to cater to our customers'
Souq_Al_Baladi_has_been_leading_consumer: needs. In Doha, Souq Al Baladi has been a leading consumer for all fresh food products and groceries Online Hypermarket for nearly three decades. It is the sole distributor in Doha decades. It is the sole distributor in Doha for many brands like Active guard, Adeera,Agrico, Ahlia, Ahmed, Airport mop, Ajwa, Akawi, Al ahlam, Al ameer, Al rifai, Al riyan,Al sadara, Al samariya, Al seedawi, American garden, California garden, Camay, Canola,carefree, Chandrika, Cheddar, Cheetos, Chef Gourmet chefs, Chings, Chocitos, Crisco,Crystal and many more.
We_ensure_that_our_fresh_food_products: We ensure that our fresh food products have the best quality and most diverse selection possible in Doha. Multi-ethnic employees are a vital part of our business, and we strive to be the most preferred employer for them. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us at info@albaladi-qatar.com.
Whatever_time_you_place_your_order: Whatever time you place your order, we guarantee that the product will reach you within 24 hours at no additional cost.
all_your_questions_and_opinions: Contact us for all your questions and opinions, or you can solve your problems in a shorter time with our contact offices.

If_days_haveexchange: Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your  purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.
eligible_for_return_your_item: To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging
Several_types_of_goods_are_exempt: Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.
some_health: Some health and personal care items
complete_your_return: To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.
please_do_not_send_your_purchase: Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.
certain_situations: There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:
book_with_obvious: Book with obvious signs of use
software_video_game: CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
any_item_not_in_its_original: Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
item_that_is_returned: Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery
received_and_inspected: Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.
refund_will_be_processed: If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days
received_a_refund: If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.
credit_card_company: Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.
next_contact_your_bank: Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.
not_received_your_refund_yet: If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.
regular_priced_items: Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded
defective_or_damaged: We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to:{physical address}.
marked_as_a_gift: If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you
item_was_not_marked_as_a_gift: If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.
return_your_product: To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.
deducted_from_your_refund: You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.
depending_on_where_you_live: Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.
trackable_shipping_service: If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.
contact_us_at_email: Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.
